alert.note: Alert for Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 12 at 7:58AM MDT until August 13 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River At Ashton affecting Spink County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River At Ashton. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect some crop land along with moderate flooding of pasture and low-lying areas * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain steady at 13.0 feet through Sunday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Sunday evening by 700 PM CDT.
